text: @realDonaldTrump Coming from this racist guy who had a paper to read off of about the coronavirus (that thing he doesn’t believe in) and on the notes every time it said coronavirus he crossed that out and wrote “China virus”. Maybe he should follow notes better when he addresses the nation. https://t.co/eCPTkOu0lL
